fr.iut.tapawaru.team

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iut.tapawaru.team.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    Team of Characters. Two Teams compete in a game. A Team contains a default number of characters at the beginning of the game. (3) Every Team has its representing color.

    • Field Summary

      private int nbCharacter
      Team's number of characters (set to static if same in every Team).
